duties_responsibilities.duty: Attend Kick-Off meetings and design backbone fiber route
Complete Cost Requests from Sales Engineering and obtain necessary circuit identifiers
Create Fiber design maps, route, and splicing prints for vendors
Provide fiber assignments to Construction Team and Create Requisitions for Purchase Order approval
Submit Change management notifications and provide closeout tasks after project completion
Work jointly with the NOC, Field Operations, and Change management for repair crews mobilization

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, Minimum 2-year technical degree, or equivalent work experience, BS/BA (preference to Civil, Construction, or Electrical, Engineering Degrees) or equivalent work experience preferred, valid driver’s license required
